message.content:
Below is a step‐by‐step solution following the required format.

1) ANALYSIS OF MAIN TARGET IMAGE

•  Overall there are TWO separate sub‐structures in the scene:

  – Left Structure (4 layers tall plus two side columns):
     • Bottom Layer: One red arch in the center.  
     • On Top of Arch: One green rectangular block.  
     • Above the Green Block: One blue cube.  
     • Topmost: One orange wedge “roof.”  
     • Flanking the Arch: Two tall orange cylinders standing vertically (one on each side).
  
  – Right Structure (2 layers tall):
     • Bottom Layer: Two horizontal orange cylinders serving as “wheels.”  
     • Top Layer: One long yellow rectangular block resting across the two cylinders.

•  Total Blocks Used: 9  
  – Left structure uses 6 blocks (arch, green block, blue cube, wedge roof, 2 vertical cylinders).  
  – Right structure uses 3 blocks (2 horizontal cylinders + 1 yellow rectangle).

2) SELECTING THE REQUIRED DICTIONARY BLOCKS

From the block‐dictionary image, the necessary pieces (with exact orientations, no rotation allowed) are:

1.  #1 (Red Arch) – for the bottom of the left structure.  
2.  #5 (Green Rectangular) – placed on top of the arch.  
3.  #2 (Blue Cube) – on top of the green rectangle.  
4.  #15 (Orange Wedge) – as the roof on the blue cube.  
5.  #8 (Orange Cylinder, vertical) × 2 – the two upright columns flanking the arch.  
6.  #9 (Orange Cylinder, horizontal) × 2 – the two “wheels” of the right‐hand structure.  
7.  #6 (Yellow Rectangular, horizontal) – resting on the two horizontal cylinders.

Hence the block indices needed are:  
[1, 2, 5, 8, 8, 9, 9, 6, 15]

3) ASSEMBLY ORDER

Below is a suggested build sequence (Step1 → bottom layers first):

{
  Step1: Move block with index 1   // Place red arch as the base (left structure)
  Step2: Move block with index 8   // Place first vertical orange cylinder (left side)
  Step3: Move block with index 8   // Place second vertical orange cylinder (right side)
  Step4: Move block with index 5   // Place green rectangular block on top of arch
  Step5: Move block with index 2   // Place blue cube on top of the green block
  Step6: Move block with index 15  // Place orange wedge roof on top of the blue cube
  Step7: Move block with index 9   // Place first horizontal orange cylinder (wheel) for the right structure
  Step8: Move block with index 9   // Place second horizontal orange cylinder (other wheel)
  Step9: Move block with index 6   // Place yellow rectangular block on top of the two wheels
}

This completes the assembly exactly as shown in the target image.
